name: Portal Panic! (CuriousCinni)
description:
Portal Panic!

A game created for a University assignment, where the mechanics had to include 'Constantly Moving', 'Game Keeps Getting Harder', and 'Time Manipulation'.

After getting stuck in-between time and space, you constantly fall through an unforgiving limbo. Manipulate time to crash through objects and survive as long as you can!

Controls
  • WASD / Left controller stick - Movement
  • Control / Left Trigger - Reverse Time
  • Shift / Right Trigger - Speed Up Time
Credit

Programming and most of the artwork done by myself

Main Song - Hypnothis by Kevin MacLeod

Menu Song - Crypto by Kevin MacLeod

Sound Effects + Music - https://zapsplat.com
